item.title: Citelic 742 - The Ultimate RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Ridiculous Ridiculous
item.description:
@Ridiculous wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:15, topic:549712”]Checked out the server a bit, here’s some feedback.

-There’s no basic guide or explaining if it’s open-world or where to go.
-Home is missing around 12 shops. (Not even including shops around the server)
-Server is missing NPCs (Don’t ask me which you can explore yourself)
-Wrong placed NPCs in almost every city. (Example the Woodcutting master at Dorics house in stead of in Lumbridge.)
-Missing quest tab.
-Missing global item spawns almost everywhere.
-Taverley dungeon not accesible.
-Shortcuts not working.
-Border guards have no animations.
-Stronghold of security not added.
-Canoe transport not added.
-Genereal stores not added.

Then i logged out…
Honestly i’m not here to ‘hate’ on your server but come on.
You advertise with aiming for quality, and having a experience development team meanwhile you’re missing like 75% of the game content.
A 718/742 requires more work then this, Citelic is a half done (open world?) server.

You shouldn’t release something like this as official, this is considered a beta.
And even if it’s a beta your team, could have done way more then what the server currently includes.
Goodluck…[/quote]

Hello Winstr,

I want to answer on some points you have made here;
Q: Wrong placed NPCs in almost every city. (Example the Woodcutting master at Dorics house in stead of in Lumbridge.)
A: All our current spawns are from the original game, which means that they’re actually located correctly. We know some of these spawns look odd but we want to give players the feeling that they actually play an older version of RuneScape.

Q: Missing quest tab.
A: If you go to the Task Tab you will see a button on the top. If you click that you’ll get a nice overlay containing; Featured, Challenges, Quests, Achievements and Minigames.

Q: Open World?
A: Nope.

Q: All your other statements.
A: We are working on our server daily, all your points are noted and will be added into the live game.
Thanks for your feedback.

UPDATE: Soulwars

Read full topic

item.title: Citelic 742 - The Ultimate RSPS
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Since when did every RSPS have to do it the way that Jagex did it?
I thought the point of owning a RSPS was to do it in your own way.

If the point is to remake runescape, then I might as well go play runescape.

Good luck on the server, I like the advert, but you could use some more media. Expand on what your server contains. Don’t ‘say’ you have something, show it.

Read full topic

item.title: Citelic 742 - The Ultimate RSPS
item.dc:creator: @ImJaws ImJaws
item.description:
@ImJaws wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:15, topic:549712”]Checked out the server a bit, here’s some feedback.

-There’s no basic guide or explaining if it’s open-world or where to go.
-Home is missing around 12 shops. (Not even including shops around the server)
-Server is missing NPCs (Don’t ask me which you can explore yourself)
-Wrong placed NPCs in almost every city. (Example the Woodcutting master at Dorics house in stead of in Lumbridge.)
-Missing quest tab.
-Missing global item spawns almost everywhere.
-Taverley dungeon not accesible.
-Shortcuts not working.
-Border guards have no animations.
-Stronghold of security not added.
-Canoe transport not added.
-Genereal stores not added.

Then i logged out…
Honestly i’m not here to ‘hate’ on your server but come on.
You advertise with aiming for quality, and having a experience development team meanwhile you’re missing like 75% of the game content.
A 718/742 requires more work then this, Citelic is a half done (open world?) server.

You shouldn’t release something like this as official, this is considered a beta.
And even if it’s a beta your team, could have done way more then what the server currently includes.
Goodluck…[/quote]

Thanks for the feedback.

Though, I don’t think you know much about 742. First off, there is no such thing as a quest tab in 742. Also, woodcutting master was relocated in 742, look up RuneScape wiki, the spawns that we do have, are dumped from the official game, meaning that it’s 100% accurate. we will look at the rest of the points and work on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Citelic 742 - The Ultimate RSPS
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Checked out the server a bit, here’s some feedback.

-There’s no basic guide or explaining if it’s open-world or where to go.
-Home is missing around 12 shops. (Not even including shops around the server)
-Server is missing NPCs (Don’t ask me which you can explore yourself)
-Wrong placed NPCs in almost every city. (Example the Woodcutting master at Dorics house in stead of in Lumbridge.)
-Missing quest tab.
-Missing global item spawns almost everywhere.
-Taverley dungeon not accesible.
-Shortcuts not working.
-Border guards have no animations.
-Stronghold of security not added.
-Canoe transport not added.
-Genereal stores not added.

Then i logged out…
Honestly i’m not here to ‘hate’ on your server but come on.
You advertise with aiming for quality, and having a experience development team meanwhile you’re missing like 75% of the game content.
A 718/742 requires more work then this, Citelic is a half done (open world?) server.

You shouldn’t release something like this as official, this is considered a beta.
And even if it’s a beta your team, could have done way more then what the server currently includes.
Goodluck…
